s1.ptxt: Remove splash guard (if equipped) referring to Splash Guard Removal and Installation (If Equipped) .
Remove front bumper referring to Front Bumper Components .
Remove headlight assembly referring to Headlight Housing Removal and Installation .
Remove cowl top garnishes referring to Cowl Top Components
Disconnect connector from side turn signal lamp.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure to install front fender noting the following instruction.

item.ptxt: If paint on fender bolt is peeled off, be sure to apply paint again.
Adjust panel clearance referring to Panel Clearance .
